title: The Lexicon
content:
We are excited to introduce the initial version of our card database for Redemption, the Lexicon!

The initial version currently only performs simple searches by card title. We are planning on rolling out more advanced search filters and add the missing Fall of Man and promotional cards soon.

We hope the Lexicon will benefit the entire Redemption community. Feel free to give any feedback on the post I will be making on the official Redemption forums.
author: Aaron Williams
